metadata.name: み [ SHISEN -視線- ]
metadata.description:
"The SHISEN is watching you."
「みてるみてる。SHISENが視てる。」
(Miteru miteru. Shisen ga miteru.)

Yokai Name: SHISEN -視線-
Original gadget: CCTV x Edo period clock

This no-gender yokai may be your ally or your enemy. Who knows who they work for.

Shisen can often be seen at the top of electric light poles individually or in groups, staring at what they see. It is unknown how many of them exist and how they use their recordings.  

"I see things and will remember them forever."

Part of "Yokai No Me ~Karuta Collection~" by NAOWAO 2021.
